abilities.name: Lava Cascade
about: Creates a wave with unlimited range that moves towards player location

abilities.name: Fire Orbs
about: Spawns orbs around the area that move in a stright line in random direction

abilities.name: Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes

abilities.name: Summon Seawitch
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter
